ygData.subject: Re: hmm
ygData.msgSnippet: nods, I am just saying that these are the combos you need to look for, and get those spell casting skills up! There is more in your spellbook than a bunch of
ygData.messageBody:
nods, I am just saying that these are the combos you need to look for, and
get those spell casting skills up! There is more in your spellbook than a
bunch of useless spells..Dont forget yer skellie, hitting it in the back the
whole time it is running from you, and back for you...
8)
----- Original Message -----
From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 9:36 AM
Subject: [shadowknight] hmm


> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> actually, fear plus darkness plus archery seems like a damn nice combo,
and
> i'll have to try that.. the only problems are that fear takes a damn long
> time to cast (making it hard to use succesfully while you are being
pounded)
> and both spells have a more or less random duration.. so dont try to do
this
> unless you are also capable of fighting up close or chasing the critter
down
> if one or both spells wear off :)
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
>
>
